message: Welcome to our store! I hope you're excited about the opportunity to own one of our exclusive products. Our track record shows an 80% chance of receiving a high-quality item. While this particular product is low-quality, it's important to remember that our overall success rate with high-quality items is quite impressive. Given its low-quality nature, we understand if you might be hesitant. However, considering our commitment to quality, we believe in the value of every item we offer. Remember, the price is fixed, there are no discounts, and once purchased, the product cannot be refunded. Thank you for considering us.

I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product, especially since it's the first product sold and I don't have any information to go on. Can I wait for more sales data to see if the proportion of high-quality products sold is consistent with the 80% claim?

Greetings! I'm glad you've decided to explore our offerings again. With every transaction, we aim to uphold the promise of delivering high-quality items. Our latest product meets this standard, backed by our 80% success rate for high-quality items. This is a rare opportunity to own a premium product at a fixed price, with no discounts available and no refund option post-purchase. Your satisfaction is paramount, and with our proven track record, we're confident you'll find value in this item. We look forward to serving you!
I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd like to know that I'm making an informed decision. Can you tell me more about your sales record and how you ensure the quality of your products?

Hello! I'm delighted to hear you're considering our products. Our sales record speaks for itself with an 80% success rate for high-quality items. We take great pride in ensuring every product meets our rigorous standards before reaching our customers. Each item undergoes thorough inspection to guarantee quality. With this round featuring another high-quality product, you're in for a premium experience. Remember, the price is set, there are no discounts, and once purchased, the product cannot be refunded. We're confident in the value offered here and look forward to your continued support.
